mapper.select: SELECT d.d_no, u.loginID as loginId, d.d_title, d.d_weather, dc_mood.detail_name AS d_mood, d.d_contents, d.d_diarydt, d.d_regdate FROM tb_diary d JOIN tb_detail_code dc_mood ON d.d_mood = dc_mood.detail_code AND dc_mood.group_code = '1' LEFT JOIN tb_userinfo u ON d.loginID = u.loginID WHERE d.d_no = #{d_no}
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_diary SET d_title = #{d_title}, d_weather = #{d_weather}, d_mood = #{d_mood}, d_contents = #{d_contents}, d_diarydt = #{d_diarydt} WHERE d_no = #{d_no}
